title: Secret (Text Deletion) Service, Gen Z/Millennials Love/Hate Remote Work 07.18.22
itunes:title: Secret (Text Deletion) Service, Gen Z/Millennials Love/Hate Remote Work 07.18.22
description:
In episode 1289, Jack and Miles are joined by writer, musician, and co-host of How Did We Get Weird, Jonah Bayer to discuss… The Cover Up Side of the Jan 6th Sh-t, The (Insert Generation Cohort Here) Hates/Loves Remote Work takes are weird, Movie Releases Are Confusing The Hell Out Of Everyone and more!

  1. The Cover Up Side of the Jan 6th Sh-t
  2. What is witness tampering? And could this charge apply to Trump?
  3. Gen Z actually doesn’t want to work from home
  4. ‘Only in Theaters’: Inside Hollywood’s Campaign to Get Audiences Back to the Big Screen
  5. Not Even Paramount Knows When Top Gun: Maverick Will Start Streaming

LISTEN: Ready or Not Here I Come (Can't Hide from Love) by The Delfonics

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
